name: Bez Ogrodek
description: With our game, you will go back to the roots of our Polish community. We present the game "BEZ OGRÓDEK" Literally... In our game we get to know the history of two neighbors. A bit dramatic but also musical! There is no space for peace here... Who would be calm knowing that your neighbor bought a new car, a house... or in this case he had a much better garden than Yours!! No problem. Time to dig him up some ROOTS...
